UNREALIZED-CAPITAL-LOSSES.explanation: The amount of losses in the period

CASH.explanation: The amount of actual cash on the account

MORTGAGE.explanation: The amount of loan for the house

OTHER-ASSETS.explanation: All other assets, such as cars

CAPITAL-ASSETS-VALUE.explanation: The current market value of all capital assets

REALIZED-CAPITAL-GAINS.explanation: The amount of received cahs flow from capital assets

UNREALIZED-CAPITAL-GAINS.explanation: Current market value of unrealized capital gains

CAPITAL-ASSETS-PURCHASE-PRICE.explanation: The purhcase price of current total capital assets
